items.sentence: I was held up on my way to the hospital in a traffic jam.
Tom called his parents, but they didn't answer the phone.
Ordinary folk like us understand nothing about it anyway.
Tom wasn't the only one who was late. Mary was late, too.
I don't think I can put up with this nonsense any longer.
I don't think Tom would be willing to lend his car to us.
Don't you think you're a bit old to go trick-or-treating?
It's surprising that you haven't heard anything from Tom.
Tom definitely doesn't speak French as well as Mary does.
It's never too late to start studying a foreign language.
